backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented gameplay features to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the game.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and base styles including dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the full-screen GameScreen.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion effect component combining flash, blast waves, embers, and smoke animations.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Bullet sprite aligned via rotation and sized responsively.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Hexagon obstacle rendered via SVG with hazard styling and glow effects.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Renders the player’s jet as an SVG with animations, positioned and rotated based on game coordinates.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game loop managing player movement, bullets, obstacles, collisions, and state transitions.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides position clamping, boundary reflection, and out‑of‑bounds detection for game entities.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Styled playfield container with decorative borders and grid overlay.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Displays UI screens for start, gameplay, pause, and game over, plus controls like fire and joystick.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements a touch‑controlled virtual joystick sending normalized movement vectors to the game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that no backend queries are needed for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining arcade‑style color variables, themes, and custom animations for game visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, container settings, plugins, and extended utilities for the project's UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current game features, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and versioned feature list.
